entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3.
